title: Florio his firste fruites which yeelde familiar speech, merie prouerbes, wittie sentences, and golden sayings. Also a perfect induction to the Italian, and English tongues, as in the table appeareth. The like heretofore, neuer by any man published.
author: Florio, John, 1553?-1625.
publicationStmtPublisher: Imprinted at the three Cranes in the Vintree, by Thomas Dawson, for Thomas Woodcocke,
